title: Idaion Antron
description: A sacred cave on Crete where it was believed Rhea hid Zeus to protect him from Cronus. Archaeological evidence indicates use as a shelter or dwelling as early as the Late Neolithic period, with religious activities taking over in the Bronze Age and continuing through the Roman period.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. Dates after BAtlas and after A. Kotsonas in EncAncHist.
properties.title: OSM location of Σπήλαιο Ιδαίον Άντρον
